recommendations: Anuradha Arora “I have personally known Nikunj's work around different projects like CSR, DE&I, Creating Social Impact and I appreciate the way she works and the enthusiasm she carries in each of her project. She has been known for bringing together diverse perspectives and raise awareness, influence actions and catalyze positive change in addressing few of the most significant social challenges.”

Ajay Surve “Nikunj is a young and dynamic professional. Having collaborated with her on strategic initiatives, Nikunj has demonstrated an ability to grasp new concepts and understand business problems. She asks pertinent questions and has a curious mind. In addition, Nikunj is very competent in secondary research. However, the key skill Nikunj brings to the table is stakeholder management and project coordination. All the best to Nikunj for her future endeavors!”

volunteer_experience.info: HBR Ascend Select is an exclusive and an invite-only community of aspiring leaders, handpicked by HBR Ascend. As a member, I get the opportunity to share my views and opinions with the editorial, marketing and product teams of HBR Ascend. I also participate in various research projects led by HBR Ascend.

honors_and_awards.description: Issued for emerging lead of the highest performing team that worked & produced highest quality services for the one of the top Chicago audit clients.

honors_and_awards.title: 'Uttam Sewak Award' for Most Committed Services
honors_and_awards.description: The most committed worker is acknowledged with the Uttam Sewak Award for services towards the society. Led a team of young enthusiasts working towards social change through different initiatives. The team undertook 90+ events in the tenure to ensure maximum awareness and participation, successfully worked in 1 adopted village and with various communities across Delhi through various NGO projects that continued even in the pandemic.

honors_and_awards.title: SDG Changemakers Award
honors_and_awards.description: The competition invited for new project ideas for sustainable development in form of posters and supported the winners with cash & mentorship to initiate the projects. I initiated project "Abhivyakti" under guidance of Mr. Akshay Chaturvedi, the founder & CEO of Leverage EDU & project was supported by University of Exeter.
